article_title: Fiorina On Clinton War on Women Claims: 'Boo Hoo Mrs. Clinton'
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Republican presidential candidate Carly Fiorina stated, “boo hoo Mrs. Clinton” in response to Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton appearing to revise the war on women talking point against Republicans on Monday’s “Fox & Friends” on the Fox News Channel.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Fiorina was asked [relevant exchange begins around 3:00] about Clinton criticizing Trump and other GOP candidates on the issue of women’s health, and Clinton appearing to revive the war on women line. She responded, “Well, first of all, boo hoo Mrs. Clinton. I mean, Mrs. Clinton is the same person who compared Republicans to terrorists. For heaven’s sakes, I actually wish Mr. Trump would throw a little more heat Hillary Clinton’s way. I feel sometimes as though I’m the only who’s consistently been critical of her. The truth is, Mrs. Clinton has lied, as secretary of state, about Benghazi, about her emails, about her server. And, so, when she revives this war on women, and make no mistake, she will. This is her go-to line. And of course, we now know that Planned Parenthood doesn’t have a lot to do with women’s health. It does have to do with the character of this nation. And I hope very much, that our leaders in Congress will once and for all, pass the Pain-Capable Unborn Child Protection Act, and defund Planned Parenthood.”

Follow Ian Hanchett on Twitter @IanHanchett
